df-trg
blocks.content: Define a topological ring, which is a ring such that the addition is a topological group operation and the multiplication is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-tdrg
blocks.content: Define a topological division ring (which differs from a topological field only in being potentially noncommutative), which is a division ring and topological ring such that the unit group of the division ring (which is the set of nonzero elements) is a topological group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-tlm
blocks.content: Define a topological left module, which is just what its name suggests: instead of a group over a ring with a scalar product connecting them, it is a topological group over a topological ring with a continuous scalar product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-tvc
blocks.content: Define a topological left vector space, which is a topological module over a topological division ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: istrg
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` R ` is a topological ring". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm istrg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, ctmd)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, ctrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, ctmd)), wa(wcel(c0, cin(ctgp, crg)), wcel(c1, ctmd)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg)), wcel(c1, ctmd)))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(ctgp, crg)), wcel(c1, ctmd), wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg)))
  elin(c0, ctgp, crg)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctrg, cin(ctgp, crg), wcel(c1, ctmd), wcel(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), ctmd))
  eleq1d(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), ctmd, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cmgp, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmgp)
  df-trg(hs0)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, ctmd))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(ctgp, crg))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, ctmd))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istrg(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing ↔(c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ TopMnd))
  ⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ∈ TopRing, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ TopMnd), (c0 ∈(TopGrp ⋂ Ring)∧ c1 ∈ TopMnd), ((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c0 ∈ Ring)∧ c1 ∈ TopMnd))
  anbi1i(c0 ∈(TopGrp ⋂ Ring), c1 ∈ TopMnd, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c0 ∈ Ring))
  elin(c0, ctgp, crg)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctrg, (TopGrp ⋂ Ring), c1 ∈ TopMnd, (mulGrp ` hs0)∈ TopMnd)
  eleq1d((mulGrp ` hs0), ctmd, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mulGrp ` hs0), c1, (mulGrp ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmgp)
  df-trg(hs0)
  df-3an(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ TopMnd)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((TopGrp ⋂ Ring))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ TopMnd)
}

blocks.name: istdrg
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` R ` is a topological ring". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm istdrg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctdrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cui, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, ctdrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp)), wa(wcel(c0, cin(ctrg, cdr)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp)))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(ctrg, cdr)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp), wa(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr)))
  elin(c0, ctrg, cdr)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctdrg, cin(ctrg, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cress, cfv(cui, cv(hs0))), ctgp))
  eleq1d(co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cress, cfv(cui, cv(hs0))), ctgp, co(c1, cress, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cress, cfv(cui, cv(hs0)), c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cmgp, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmgp)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cui, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cui, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cui)
  df-tdrg(hs0)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(ctrg, cdr))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), ctgp))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istdrg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing ↔(c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧(c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp))
  ⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Unit ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ∈ TopDRing, (c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧(c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp), (c0 ∈(TopRing ⋂ DivRing)∧(c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp), ((c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing)∧(c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp))
  anbi1i(c0 ∈(TopRing ⋂ DivRing), (c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp, (c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing))
  elin(c0, ctrg, cdr)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctdrg, (TopRing ⋂ DivRing), (c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp, ((mulGrp ` hs0)[|`s](Unit ` hs0))∈ TopGrp)
  eleq1d(((mulGrp ` hs0)[|`s](Unit ` hs0)), ctgp, (c1[|`s]c2), hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d((mulGrp ` hs0), cress, (Unit ` hs0), c1, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mulGrp ` hs0), c1, (mulGrp ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmgp)
  syl6eqr((Unit ` hs0), c2, (Unit ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cui)
  df-tdrg(hs0)
  df-3an(c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ DivRing, (c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((TopRing ⋂ DivRing))
  diff.hs0.w((c1[|`s]c2)∈ TopGrp)
}

blocks.name: istdrg2
blocks.content: A topological-ring division ring is a topological division ring iff the group of nonzero elements is a topological group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm istdrg2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctdrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), ctgp)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, ctdrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), ctgp)), w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp)))
  istdrg(c0, c1, cfv(cui, c0))
  3bitr4i(w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp)), w3a(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), ctgp)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wcel(co(c1, cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wcel(co(c1, cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), ctgp)))
  pm5.32i(wa(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wcel(co(c1, cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp), wcel(co(c1, cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), ctgp))
  eleq1d(co(c1, cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp, co(c1, cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wa(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr)))
  oveq2d(c1, cress, cfv(cui, c0), cdif(c2, csn(c3)), wa(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(c2, csn(c3))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wcel(c0, crg))
  isdrng(c0, cfv(cui, c0), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cui, c0))
  df-3an(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cfv(cui, c0)), ctgp))
  df-3an(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), ctgp))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istdrg2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing ↔(c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧(c1[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))∈ TopGrp))
  ⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ TopDRing, (c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧(c1[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))∈ TopGrp), (c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧(c1[|`s](Unit ` c0))∈ TopGrp))
  istdrg(c0, c1, (Unit ` c0))
  3bitr4i((c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧(c1[|`s](Unit ` c0))∈ TopGrp), (c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing ∧(c1[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))∈ TopGrp), ((c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing)∧(c1[|`s](Unit ` c0))∈ TopGrp), ((c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing)∧(c1[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))∈ TopGrp))
  pm5.32i((c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing), (c1[|`s](Unit ` c0))∈ TopGrp, (c1[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))∈ TopGrp)
  eleq1d((c1[|`s](Unit ` c0)), ctgp, (c1[|`s](c2 \ { c3 })), (c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing))
  oveq2d(c1, cress, (Unit ` c0), (c2 \ { c3 }), (c0 ∈ TopRing ∧ c0 ∈ DivRing))
  adantl(c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ DivRing, (Unit ` c0)=(c2 \ { c3 }))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ DivRing, (Unit ` c0)=(c2 \ { c3 }), c0 ∈ Ring)
  isdrng(c0, (Unit ` c0), c2, c3)
  eqid((Unit ` c0))
  df-3an(c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ DivRing, (c1[|`s](Unit ` c0))∈ TopGrp)
  df-3an(c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ DivRing, (c1[|`s](c2 \ { c3 }))∈ TopGrp)
}

blocks.name: mulrcn
blocks.content: The functionalization of the ring multiplication operation is a continuous function in a topological ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: invrcn2
blocks.content: The multiplicative inverse function is a continuous function from the unit group (that is, the nonzero numbers) to itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm invrcn2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, crest, c3), ccn, co(c2, crest, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cinvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cui, c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, crest, c3), ccn, co(c2, crest, c3))), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c3), ctgp))
  tdrgunit(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0), c3)
  tgpinv(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c3), c1, co(c2, crest, c3))
  resstopn(c2, c3, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c3), cfv(cmgp, c0))
  mgptopn(c2, cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  invrfval(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c3), c3, c0)
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm invrcn2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c1 ∈((c2[|`t]c3)[Cn](c2[|`t]c3)))
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(invr ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(Unit ` c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ TopDRing, c1 ∈((c2[|`t]c3)[Cn](c2[|`t]c3)), ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c3)∈ TopGrp)
  tdrgunit(c0, (mulGrp ` c0), c3)
  tgpinv(((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c3), c1, (c2[|`t]c3))
  resstopn(c2, c3, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c3), (mulGrp ` c0))
  mgptopn(c2, (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  invrfval(c1, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c3), c3, c0)
  eqid(((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c3))
}

blocks.name: cnmpt1mulr
blocks.content: Continuity of ring multiplication; analogue of ~ cnmpt12f which cannot be used directly because ` .r ` is not a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmpt1mulr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ctopn, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ctrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  cnmpt1plusg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cmgp, c6), w0)
  mgptopn(c5, cfv(cmgp, c6), c6)
  mgpplusg(c2, cfv(cmgp, c6), c6)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cmgp, c6), ctmd), wcel(c6, ctrg))
  trgtmd(c6, cfv(cmgp, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c6))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c6)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnmpt1mulr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[c2]c3))∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  ⊣ c5 =(TopOpen ` c6)
  ⊣ c2 =(× ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ TopRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(TopOn ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  cnmpt1plusg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (mulGrp ` c6), w0)
  mgptopn(c5, (mulGrp ` c6), c6)
  mgpplusg(c2, (mulGrp ` c6), c6)
  syl(w0, (mulGrp ` c6)∈ TopMnd, c6 ∈ TopRing)
  trgtmd(c6, (mulGrp ` c6))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c6))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c6)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
}

blocks.pretty:
thm cnmpt2mulr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦(c2[c3]c4))∈((c5[tX]c6)[Cn]c7))
